name: Jorge Albert Merino
description:
Officials in the Houston area are investigating a deadly police shooting caught on video Monday night. That cellphone video, posted on social media, shows a Baytown police officer firing five shots after struggling to arrest a 45-year-old woman. Nikki Battiste reports.
